paragraph1.subtitle: What is CSS?
paragraph1.text:
We use CSS to style Web pages.

CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets

CSS describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media

CSS saves a lot of work.

It can control the layout of multiple web pages all at onceExternal stylesheets are stored in CSS files
